dataList.name: แอปเปิลของสนธยา
dataList.desc:
When the Fruit is destroyed, all parts are inflicted with 2 Fragile.
The Fruit regenerates after 1 turn.
dataList.summary: When the Fruit is destroyed, apply 2 Fragile to all parts

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY1
dataList.desc: After the head regenerates once, bringing the head’s HP to 50% initiates a choice prompt.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY2
dataList.desc: At the start of Turn 3, a choice prompt where you can remove the Green Stem effect is initiated.

dataList.name: รากรัดแน่น
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, inflict 1 Bind on all enemies.
This lasts until the Roots have been broken.
dataList.summary: Inflict 1 Bind on all enemies until Roots are broken

dataList.name: รากหนึ่งราก
dataList.desc: The Roots gain 2 Attack Power Up for each intact Arm.

dataList.name: โปรดให้งานเทศกาลเลือดไหลเวียน
dataList.desc: The battle proceeds to the next phase after all the Clay Dolls are defeated.

dataList.name: DON'T LET THE KIDS READ THIS
dataList.desc: At the start of turn 2 in phase 2, choice prompt 1 is initiated.

dataList.name: โปรดให้งานเทศกาลเพลิงลุกโชน
dataList.desc: If both Arms are destroyed or the main body’s HP is brought to 70%, the battle proceeds to the next phase.

dataList.name: ระห่ำดุเดือด
dataList.desc:
During Phase 3
At the start of the turn, inflict 3 Burn on all enemies.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY
dataList.desc: When HP is brought to 60%, choice prompt 2 is initiated.

dataList.name: โปรดให้งานเทศกาลดวงดาวร่วงโรย
dataList.desc: When HP is brought to 25%, the battle proceeds to the next phase.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY
dataList.desc: At the start of turn 2 in phase 4, choice prompt 3 is initiated.

dataList.name: สังเวยรูปปั้น
dataList.desc:
Does not die at 0 HP; instead, remains on the stage as an immobile and untargetable unit.
Suppressed when the Doomsday Calendar is suppressed.

dataList.name: ทองคำร้าว
dataList.desc: Heals HP every turn based on the amount of Golden Sheen.

dataList.name: แก่นเปราะบาง
dataList.desc:
When the Head is destroyed, all parts are inflicted with Immobilize next turn.
The Head regenerates after 1 turn.

dataList.name: แอปเปิลเน่า
dataList.desc: After the body is destroyed, all parts are inflicted with 2 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY
dataList.desc: NOT FOR DISPLAY

dataList.name: โรงงานอัพเกรดทำงาน
dataList.desc: When this unit is defeated, it revives the next turn and gains 1 Surgery.

dataList.name: เธอจะต้องแข็งแกร่ง
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 1 Protection.

dataList.name: เธอจะต้องแข็งแกร่ง
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 2 Protection.

dataList.name: ความใคร่สั่นคลอน
dataList.desc: While Desirous, the unit gains 2 Fragile and 10 Bind, gains 1 skill slot, and changes behavior.

dataList.name: ความใคร่เหนี่ยวรั้ง
dataList.desc: The unit becomes Desirous every time it loses 30% of its HP.

dataList.name: สั่นพยอง
dataList.desc: Gain 1 Protection for every ally that died this wave. (Max 5.)

dataList.name: แขนเส้นเลือดกระตุก
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain Attack Power Up and Protection by the Count of Instincts.

dataList.name: แขนเสียหาย
dataList.desc: Lose 1 Instincts whenever the unit takes damage from attacks.

dataList.name: กระดองฟื้นฟู
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if the unit didn’t take any damage from attacks during the turn, heal 5% HP and gain 1 Instincts.

dataList.name: ดวงตาบ้าคลั่ง
dataList.desc:
Behavior depends on the Count of Instincts.
Uses aggressive skills at +4 Instincts, and becomes defensive at 3 or less.

dataList.name: ความเกรี้ยวกราดเพิ่มฤทธิ์
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, gain 1 Instincts.
If the unit has +4 Instincts at the end of the turn, enter a state of Frenzy.

dataList.name: ระห่ำดุเดือด
dataList.desc: In the Frenzy state, the unit gains 3 Attack Power Up and 3 Fragile, changes behavior, and does not gain Instincts from being attacked.

dataList.name: โกรธาเปร่งแสง
dataList.desc: At less than 50% HP, enters Frenzy every turn.

dataList.name: ความเกรี้ยวกราดเพิ่มฤทธิ์
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, gain 1 Instincts.
If the unit has +4 Instincts at the end of the turn, enter a state of Frenzy.

dataList.name: ระห่ำดุเดือด
dataList.desc: In the Frenzy state, the unit gains 3 Attack Power Up and 3 Fragile, changes behavior, and does not gain Instincts from being attacked.

dataList.name: เนื้อเน่า
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if at less than 50% HP, inflict 3 Poison when attacked.

dataList.name: ลอกคราบ
dataList.desc: After this part is broken, if the other arm is not broken at the end of the following turn, this part regenerates with the same HP as it.

dataList.name: บิดเนื้อครวญคร่ำ
dataList.desc: When both arms are broken, the unit gains 5 Fragile and inflicts 10 Poison on all enemies every turn.

dataList.name: สัญชาตญาณยั้วเยี้ย
dataList.desc:
Behavior depends on the Count of Instincts.
Uses aggressive skills at +4 Instincts, and becomes defensive at 0.

dataList.name: Severed Arm
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the unit gains 5 Fragile every turn.

dataList.name: เสียงผิวปากชวนหวาดผวา
dataList.desc: If you have collected less than 3 of A Sign, Sinclair is inflicted with 1 Bind and Paralyze every turn.

dataList.name: ความกล้าจะเอาชนะความกลัว
dataList.desc: If you have collected 3 or more of A Sign, Sinclair gains 1 Attack Power Up and 2 Protection every turn.

dataList.name: โอบรับความเจ็บปวดซะ!
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if the unbroken part has Bleed or Burn, heal 15% of Max HP and gain 3 Attack Power Up.
The healing and status effects gained are decreased based on the number of A Sign, down to 0.

dataList.name: พรแห่งการประหาร
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy, gain 2 Haste and 5 Damage Up next turn.

dataList.name: สุขีปรีดาท่วมท้น
dataList.desc: Starting with Turn 3, becomes Ecstatic every 2 turns.

dataList.name: ความบริสุทธิ์เบิกบาน
dataList.desc: If Kromer’s main body is brought to 50% HP, she gains Purity for the remaining turns.

dataList.name: ชิ้นเนื้อไร้ตำหนิ
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the part is inflicted with 2 Attack Power Down.

dataList.name: Blood Sac
dataList.desc:
Wrath Resistance increases.
Gloom Resistance decreases.

dataList.name: Fluid Sac
dataList.desc: While the Fluid Sac status is active, the Core heals (20 * Fluid Sac Count) HP.

dataList.name: Boiling Blood
dataList.desc: If the body is broken while Blood Sac is active, all enemies take 20 fixed damage.

dataList.name: Lightning Rod
dataList.desc:
When the Telephone Pole is hit, inflict 2 Shock on the attacker this turn.
At 5+ Lightning, all Parts will inflict 3 Shock on the attacker, starting next turn.
(Lasts until Lightning reaches 0.)
When hit by a Sloth attack, the amount of Shock inflicted is halved. (Rounded up.)

dataList.name: Lightning
dataList.desc:
While the telephone pole isn’t broken, gain 1 Lightning after an attack.
Whenever the telephone pole is hit by an attack, lose 1 Lightning.

dataList.name: Breaking Pieces
dataList.desc:
When the telephone pole is Staggered or Broken, lose all Lightning.
All attacks of Alleyway Watchdog will then be canceled for the turn.

dataList.name: Bongy Chicken Struts
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, deal 3 SP damage to a random enemy.

dataList.name: Bongy Chicken Beefs Up
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, apply 2 Damage Up and 2 Protection to all allies next turn.

dataList.name: Vigorous Volaille
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, heal 5 HP for each Raw Chicken in battle.

dataList.name: Gloomy Gallus
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, deal 5 SP damage to all enemies for each Raw Chicken in battle.

dataList.name: Fragile Fowl
dataList.desc: When a Part breaks, gain 1 Fragile every turn for each Raw Chicken that died before the Part was broken.

dataList.name: Powerful Poussin
dataList.desc: If the Part isn’t broken, gain 1 Damage Up for each living Raw Chicken.

dataList.name: Expanding Sorrow
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if the unit has 3+ Unresolved Sorrow, generates a head next turn and changes behavior.

dataList.name: Inconsolable Sorrow
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if the unit has 3+ Unresolved Sorrow and the head is broken, becomes staggered next turn.

dataList.name: Taken by the Horns
dataList.desc: When the head is staggered, all parts become staggered next turn.

dataList.name: Downed by the Horns
dataList.desc: When the head is broken, all parts become staggered next turn. Afterwards, all parts have 3 Attack Power Down for the duration of the battle.

dataList.name: Living Nerves
dataList.desc:
Upon death, all Skills are cancelled for the turn.
Doubles currently owned Self-charge.

dataList.name: Motioning Nerves
dataList.desc:
After dying, attack skills spend 1 Self-charge.
Attacks enemies until Self-charge runs out.

dataList.name: Undying Persistence
dataList.desc: Every 5 turns, gains a Shield equal to the head's HP.

dataList.name: Terminated Persistence
dataList.desc:
After using 'Coil Up', if the Shield is exhausted, spend Self-charge.
All parts become staggered next turn.

dataList.name: Broken Umbrella
dataList.desc: After the back is broken, gain 3 Fragile every turn. Inflict +2 Rupture.

dataList.name: Ragged Umbrella
dataList.desc: After the head umbrella is broken, gain 5 Offense Level Down every turn. Inflict +2 Sinking.

dataList.name: Last Struggle
dataList.desc:
At 15% HP, the unit's Speed is fixed at 1, and gains 1 Attack Power Down.
Newly spawned Old Umbrellas have 30% more HP. Uses 'Cries Seeking Something' every turn.

dataList.name: Spreading Ember
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if this unit has Burn, inflict the same amount to all units with Entangled Curse Talisman next turn

dataList.name: Broken Means
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, it deals -20% damage

dataList.name: Booze Makes You Hicc!
dataList.desc: After using 'I'll Have This!' on enemies with 5+ Tipsy and successfully landing the attack, become staggered.

dataList.name: Stimulating Smell, Isn't It?
dataList.desc:
A mysterious smell from within boosts the spirit.
A random Sinner gains 5 Morale Boost at the start of the wave.

dataList.name: Old and Abandoned
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, the Sinner that defeated it gains 2 Haste next turn.
All parts of Drifting Fox are inflicted with 2 Bind and 1 Umbrella Splinters.

dataList.name: จิตเปราะต่ออันตราย
dataList.desc: เมื่อจบเทิร์น จะเสีย SP 10 หน่วย

dataList.name: ใจเปราะต่ออันตราย
dataList.desc: ในขณะที่กำลังขวัญอ่อน จะได้รับ [Enhancement] 2 หน่วย และ [Binding] 3 หน่วย

dataList.name: ดวงใจสั่นคลอน
dataList.desc: เมื่อเข้าสู่สภาวะแตกตื่น จะติดชะงัก

dataList.name: ปณิธาน
dataList.desc: เมื่อฟื้นจากสภาวะแตกตื่น จะฟื้น SP ทั้งหมด และได้รับ [Agility] 2 หน่วย กับ [Enhancement] 2 หน่วย

dataList.name: E.G.O บริษัทโลโบโตมี
dataList.desc: เริ่มการต่อสู้พร้อมโล่เลือด 1200 หน่วย

dataList.name: ปิดกั้นดวงจิต
dataList.desc:
เมื่อใดก็ตามที่ตัวละครนี้ถูกกำจัด ทงแบ็คจะได้รับจำนวนครั้ง [Sinking] +5 หน่วย และซินเนอร์ทั้งหมดจะเสียจำนวนครั้ง [Sinking] 2 หน่วย
จากนั้นซินเนอร์ทั้งหมดจะได้รับ [Protection] 1 หน่วย และ [Enhancement] 2 หน่วยในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: ผันผลิเต็มดอก
dataList.desc: เมื่อเริ่มเทิร์นที่ 5 จะอัญเชิญ 'ดอกไม้จวนผลิ' 4 ต้นที่มี [DongbaekGrow] 3 หน่วย

dataList.name: จิตใจเบิกบาน
dataList.desc: เมื่อเลือดลดลงถึง 50% จะเข้าสู่การต่อสู้ช่วงถัดไป โดยเลือดจะไม่ลดลงต่ำกว่า 50% จนกว่าจะเปลี่ยนช่วง

dataList.name: ท้าดวล
dataList.desc:
เมื่อเลือดต่ำกว่า 50% จะใช้สกิลพิเศษเพื่อเล็งเป้าหมาย 1 คน จากนั้นจะต้านทานต่อการชะงักและการแตกตื่นในอีก 2 เทิร์นถัดไป
หากอีซังมี 'ท้าดวล' ทงแบ็คจะได้รับ [Enhancement] 1 หน่วย
หากอีซังชนะการประลอง พันธมิตรทั้งหมดจะได้รับ [AttackDmgUp] 3 หน่วยในเทิร์นถัดไป
หากทงแบ็คชนะการประลอง ทงแบ็คจะฟื้นฟู SP ทั้งหมด

dataList.name: ราคาของการผลิดอก
dataList.desc: หากสกิล 'ลมโชยฤดูวสันต์อันงดงาม' แคลชแพ้ จะเสีย SP 10 หน่วย

dataList.name: บุษบาเติบใหญ่
dataList.desc: อัญเชิญขึ้นมาพร้อม [DongbaekGrow] 1 หน่วย

dataList.name: 나오면 안되는 텍스트 (번역 x)
dataList.desc: 나오면 안되는 텍스트 (번역 x)

dataList.name: 나오면 안되는 텍스트 (번역 x)
dataList.desc: 나오면 안되는 텍스트 (번역 x)

dataList.name: ทำลายตนเอง
dataList.desc: สกิลทั้งหมดจะเล็งเป้าหมายแบบไม่เลือกหน้า ทุกครั้งที่ใช้สกิล ตัวละครนี้จะเสียเลือด 2% ของ HP สูงสุด

dataList.name: Self Salvation
dataList.desc: HP healing effects heal twice as much.

dataList.name: Radiant Vanity
dataList.desc: While this unit is present, Dongrang gains 1 Protection and 1 Attack Power Up at the start of each turn.

dataList.name: Earnest Accomplishment
dataList.desc:
While this unit has Earnest Accomplishment, the following effects apply:
- Can only be defeated with Dongrang's attacks.
- If a Sinner drops this unit's HP to 1, the Sinner heals HP, and this unit gains Empty Honor.
- If Dongrang defeats this unit, Dongrang heals HP and powers up next turn.

dataList.name: Empty Honor
dataList.desc:
While this unit has Empty Honor, the following effects apply:
- Can only be defeated with Dongrang's attacks.
- If Dongrang defeats this unit, Dongrang loses HP, gains 1 Emptiness, and is weakened next turn

dataList.name: Borne Fruition
dataList.desc: The unit that defeated this unit heals by 5% of Max HP, and gains 1 Haste and 1 Attack Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Toward the Ideal
dataList.desc: When the HP is brought to 85% and 50% of Max HP, respectively, spawns 2 Trees of Desires and changes behavior.

dataList.name: Radiant Desire
dataList.desc: While this unit is present, Dongrang gains 1 Damage Up and 1 Protection at the start of each turn.

dataList.name: Price of Neglect
dataList.desc: If 'Time of Harvest' loses in a clash, lose 5 SP

dataList.name: Bitter Smile
dataList.desc: When in panic, gain 2 Protection and reset SP to 0 at the start of the next turn.

dataList.name: Inefficient Judgement
dataList.desc: When recovering from stagger, gain 1 Attack Power Up.

dataList.name: Exhausting Endeavor
dataList.desc: After using the skill Please Be My Nutrient 3 times, become staggered next turn.

dataList.name: Toward the Ideal
dataList.desc: When the HP is brought to 85% of Max HP, spawns 2 Trees of Desires and changes behavior.

dataList.name: Toward the Ideal
dataList.desc: When the HP is brought to 50% of Max HP, spawns 2 Trees of Desires and changes behavior.

dataList.name: Fairy Lure
dataList.desc: When the fairy is attacked, only that part loses HP.

dataList.name: Exposed Base
dataList.desc:
When the fairy part is broken, the roots can be attacked next turn.
All parts gain 1 Attack Power Up, 2 Bind, and 3 Fragile next turn.

dataList.name: Spare Lure
dataList.desc:
The fairy regenerates the turn after the roots are exposed. (One time only)
After the roots are exposed 3 times or destroyed, the unit is enraged.

dataList.name: Discovered Weakness
dataList.desc: If the fairy has Tremor, it takes damage by its Potency at the end of the turn. (Max 20)

dataList.name: Connected Weakness
dataList.desc: If the part has Burn, it takes more damage based on its Potency. (Max +15%)

dataList.name: Manufactured Respite
dataList.desc: If the giant clover is present, this unit heals 30 HP at the end of the turn.

dataList.name: Lost Means
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the unit gains 2 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: Damaged Shade
dataList.desc: When the head is broken, the unit gains 4 Defense Level Down and 1 Fragile every turn.

dataList.name: Contaminating Leaf
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, give 1 HP Healing Boost and 1 Attack Power Up to Fairy-Long-Legs.

dataList.name: Contaminating Leaf
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, give 1 HP Healing Boost and 1 Attack Power Up to Fairy-Long-Legs.

dataList.name: Momentary Satiation
dataList.desc: Turn End: If the ally with [PreparedMeat] is at 1 HP, kill the ally; then, all Parts gain 5 [Vulnerable], [Reduction], and [Disarming].

dataList.name: Ravening Hunger
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: If there are surviving allies at 25%- HP, kill all allies.
Heal (# of allies killed x 5)% of max Core HP.
Turn End: If there are no surviving allies, gain 20 [Enhancement] next turn.

dataList.name: Torn Arm
dataList.desc: When an Arm is broken, the Body gains 5 Bleed at every Turn Start.

dataList.name: Invitation to a Meal
dataList.desc: Turn End: All Sinners heal 10 SP, and gain +1 E.G.O resource for all Affinities

dataList.name: Empty Belly
dataList.desc: Turn End: If the ally with [PreparedMeat] is Staggered, kill the ally.

dataList.name: Bottomless Hunger
dataList.desc: After defeating an ally, heal 20 Core HP; then, gain 1 [Vulnerable] next turn.

dataList.name: Hunger
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If this unit failed to defeat an ally with Prepared Meat, gain 1 [Hunger]. At 75%- HP, gain 2. At 50%- HP, gain 3.
Turn Start: If this unit defeated an ally with Prepared Meat, lose 1 [Hunger].

dataList.name: Momentary Satiation
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 0 [Hunger], gain (allies defeated this turn x 3) [AttackDown] and [DefenseDown].

dataList.name: Ravening Hunger
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 4 [Hunger], gain a stronger pattern.

dataList.name: Returning Past
dataList.desc: If at 50+ [AccumulatedPastMirror], and if Core's HP is less than or equal to 80%, Core gains 200 HP by spending 50 [AccumulatedPastMirror] at Turn End

dataList.name: Misplaced Past
dataList.desc:
When the body is broken, spend all Accumulated Past.
When the body is broken, all Attack Types and Affinities become ineffective(0.5) against the body starting next turn until the end of this encounter.

dataList.name: Metronome
dataList.desc:
If the [AccumulatedPastMirror] is an odd number, gain 3 [Vulnerable] and [AttackDmgUp]
If it is an even number, gain 3 [Protection] and [AttackDmgDown]

dataList.name: Care
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Heal 15% of max HP

dataList.name: Keep It Fresh
dataList.desc: HP does not drop below 1
